title: Close Customer Account
description: A customer requests to have their account and all associated data permanently deleted.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer's identity with a high level of scrutiny to prevent malicious closures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows a strict verification process.

tasks.description: Confirm with the customer that this action is irreversible and will delete their order history and saved information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the consequences of account closure.

tasks.description: Initiate the account deletion process, which may involve anonymizing past orders for data retention purposes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully triggers the account closure and data deletion workflow.
